disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Fury of the Dragonborn.

blurb.value: Shyvana deals bonus damage to dragons and gains Armor and Magic Resistance. As Shyvana and her allies slay more dragons, she gains more bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.

description.value: Innate: Shyvana deals 20% bonus physical and magic damage to Dragons.

description2.value: Additionally, Shyvana starts with  5 bonus armor and  5 bonus magic resistance, which is permanently increased by 5 for every elemental drake ( Cloud Drake, Infernal Drake, Mountain Drake, and Ocean Drake) and Elder Dragon her team slays.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Twin Bite.

blurb.value: Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds. Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front Shyvana.

description.value: Active: Shyvana's next basic attack within 6 seconds causes her to strike again after 0.25 seconds, dealing bonus physical damage.

description2.value: The second strike applies on-hit and on-attack effects and is affected by critical strike modifiers.

description3.value: Shyvana's basic attacks reduce Twin Bite's  cooldown by 0.5 seconds on-hit.

description4.value: Twin Bite resets Shyvana's basic attack timer.

description5.value: Dragon Form: Shyvana instantly attacks all enemies in a cone around her target before applying Twin Bite's effects to each of them. The basic attacks deal 100% AD physical damage, are affected by critical strike modifiers, and apply on-hit effects to each target hit. The second strike cannot critically strike nor trigger on-attack effects, but it will still apply on-hit effects. Additionally, Twin Bite's empowered attack becomes unstoppable.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: *Dragon Form's Twin Bite cannot apply Tiamat's Cleave on each target hit because of Cleave's internal 0.05 seconds interval during which it cannot be applied on a different target. Since the second strike applies after the ability goes on cooldown, it will reduce its own cooldown. Unlike most on-hit effects, the one reducing the cooldown of Twin Bite also triggers against structures. In Dragon Form, Twin Bite consumes an additional stack of Hail of Blades. *
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Burnout.

blurb.value: Shyvana surrounds herself in fire, dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies and moving faster for 3 seconds, part of this damage is applied again when Shyvana basic attacks an enemy with Burnout active. The Movement Speed reduces over the duration of the spell. Basic attacks extend the duration of Burnout. Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size.

description.value: Active: Shyvana surrounds herself in flames for 3 seconds, gaining  bonus movement speed and dealing magic damage to surrounding enemies each second.

leveling.value: Initial Movement Speed:30 / 35 / 40 / 45 / 50%Magic Damage Per Second:20 / 32.5 / 45 / 57.5 / 70 (+ 20% bonus AD)

description2.value: Basic attacking an enemy while Burnout is active deals 25% of Burnout's damage to all enemies surrounding Shyvana and, against non-structures, extends Burnout's duration by 1 second, stacking up to 4 times for a maximum total duration of 7 seconds.

leveling2.value: Magic Damage Per Hit:5 / 8.125 / 11.25 / 14.375 / 17.5 (+ 5% bonus AD)

description3.value: Bonus movement speed decays linearly over the duration.

description4.value: Dragon Form: Burnout has increased effect radius, scaling with Dragon's Descent's rank.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * PENDING FOR TEST: Magic damage on-hit's interactions with dodging, blocking, and blinding effects.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Flame Breath.

effect radius.value: 345

width.value: 120 / ?

blurb.value: Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to all enemies it encounters and leaves cinders on the target, marking them for 5 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks on marked targets deal a percentage of their maximum Health as damage on-hit. Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing bonus damage and scorching the earth for a short duration.

description.value: Active: Shyvana unleashes a fireball in the target direction, stopping upon colliding with an enemy champion and dealing magic damage to all enemies hit and marking them for 5 seconds.

description2.value: Shyvana's basic attacks against marked enemies deal 3.75% of the target's  maximum health as bonus magic damage, capped at 150 against monsters.

description3.value: Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes upon hitting an enemy champion or reaching the target location, dealing increased magic damage to them and surrounding enemies and scorching the earth for 4 seconds. Enemies standing on scorched earth take 30 − 60 (based on level) (+ 5% AD) (+ 10% AP) magic damage every 0.5 seconds.

leveling3.value: Empowered Magic Damage:100 − 160 (based on level) + 60 / 100 / 140 / 180 / 220 (+ 60% AD) (+ 100% AP)

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The fireball applies area damage and the triggering basic attacks deal proc damage. In Dragon Form, the fiery explosion applies area damage and the burning scorch deals persistent area damage to all enemies within the area of effect. In Dragon Form, both areas of effect will be centered on the first champion struck, not at the location the missile collided with them. Flame Breath will cast from wherever Shyvana is at the end of the cast time. PENDING FOR TEST: Magic damage on-hit's interactions with dodging, blocking, and blinding effects.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Dragon's Descent.

blurb.value: Shyvana transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take damage and are knocked toward her target location. Shyvana passively gains Fury per second and gains 2 Fury on basic attack.

description.value: Passive - Fury: Dragon's Descent has no cooldown or initial cost but can only be activated while Shyvana has 100 Fury. Shyvana passively generates Fury per second while she is alive and in human form, 2 Fury per basic attack on-hit in either form, and 100 Fury when Dragon's Descent is first learned.

description2.value: Active: Shyvana transforms into a ferocious dragon, becoming displacement immune, dashing to the target location and carrying and dealing magic damage to all enemies she passes through.

description3.value: Shyvana's dragon form grants her  bonus health,  bonus attack range, increased size and empowers her basic abilities at the cost of 2.5 Fury per 0.5 seconds, returning to human form once depleted.

leveling3.value:
Bonus Health:150 / 200 / 250 / 300 / 350
Bonus Range:50 / 57.5 / 65 / 72.5 / 80
Size Increase:0 / 8.5 / 16%

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Shyvana is displacement immune on-cast and the immunity lasts until the dash ends. Dragon's Descent has a 100 / 80 / 66.67 / 57.14 / 50 seconds effective cooldown when not attacking. Cloudbringer's Grace grants 10 / 20 / 30 / 40% (based on stacks) increased Fury generation, for an effective cooldown when non attacking of: 90.91 / 72.73 / 60.61 / 51.95 / 45.45 with 1 stack. 83.33 / 66.67 / 55.56 / 47.62 / 41.67 with 2 stacks. 76.92 / 61.54 / 51.28 / 43.96 / 38.46 with 3 stacks. 71.43 / 57.14 / 47.62 / 40.82 / 35.71 with 4 stacks. Dragon's Descent has a 20 seconds effective duration when not attacking, but can last indefinitely when attacking continuously with 2.5 ( 2.27 / 2.08 / 1.92 / 1.79) attack speed (without counting Twin Bite) or 1.875 ( 1.7 / 1.56 / 1.44 / 1.34) attack speed with Guinsoo's Rageblade.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.
